title: Product Brand
description: Captures properties related to product branding generic to all industries.

xdm:productPageURL.title: Product Page URL
xdm:productPageURL.description: The URL for the landing page of a product.

xdm:productImageURL.title: Product Image URL
xdm:productImageURL.description: The URL for the primary product image of the product.

xdm:productLogoURL.title: Product Logo URL
xdm:productLogoURL.description: The URL for the product logo associated with the product.

xdm:productCardBackgroundColor.title: Product Card Background Color
xdm:productCardBackgroundColor.description: The primary product card background color, typically in hex format.

xdm:learningResourceURL.title: Learning Resource URL
xdm:learningResourceURL.description: The URL for educational or training resources related to the product.

xdm:productDetails.title: Product Details
xdm:productDetails.description: Additional descriptive details about the product, such as pricing, features, or specifications.

xdm:actions.title: Product Actions
xdm:actions.description: Array of actions available for the product
